entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
